12 template <typename VoxelType>
13 class LayerTest {
14  public:
15  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
16 
17  void CompareLayers(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer_A,
18  const Layer<VoxelType>& layer_B) const {
19  EXPECT_NEAR(layer_A.voxel_size(), layer_B.voxel_size(), kTolerance);
20  EXPECT_NEAR(layer_A.block_size(), layer_B.block_size(), kTolerance);
21  EXPECT_EQ(layer_A.voxels_per_side(), layer_B.voxels_per_side());
22  EXPECT_EQ(layer_A.getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks(),
23  layer_B.getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks());
24 
25  BlockIndexList blocks_A, blocks_B;
26  layer_A.getAllAllocatedBlocks(&blocks_A);
27  layer_B.getAllAllocatedBlocks(&blocks_B);
28  EXPECT_EQ(blocks_A.size(), blocks_B.size());
29  for (const BlockIndex& index_A : blocks_A) {
30  BlockIndexList::const_iterator it =
31  std::find(blocks_B.begin(), blocks_B.end(), index_A);
32  if (it != blocks_B.end()) {
33  const Block<VoxelType>& block_A = layer_A.getBlockByIndex(index_A);
34  const Block<VoxelType>& block_B = layer_B.getBlockByIndex(*it);
35  CompareBlocks(block_A, block_B);
36  } else {
37  ADD_FAILURE();
38  LOG(ERROR) << "Block at index [" << index_A.transpose()
39  << "] in layer_A does not exists in layer_B";
40  }
41  }
42  for (const BlockIndex& index_B : blocks_B) {
43  BlockIndexList::const_iterator it =
44  std::find(blocks_A.begin(), blocks_A.end(), index_B);
45  if (it != blocks_A.end()) {
46  const Block<VoxelType>& block_B = layer_A.getBlockByIndex(index_B);
47  const Block<VoxelType>& block_A = layer_B.getBlockByIndex(*it);
48  CompareBlocks(block_B, block_A);
49  } else {
50  ADD_FAILURE();
51  LOG(ERROR) << "Block at index [" << index_B.transpose()
52  << "] in layer_B does not exists in layer_A";
53  }
54  }
55 
56  EXPECT_EQ(layer_A.getMemorySize(), layer_B.getMemorySize());
57  }
58 
59  void CompareBlocks(const Block<VoxelType>& block_A,
60  const Block<VoxelType>& block_B) const {
61  EXPECT_NEAR(block_A.voxel_size(), block_B.voxel_size(), kTolerance);
62  EXPECT_NEAR(block_A.block_size(), block_B.block_size(), kTolerance);
63  EXPECT_EQ(block_A.voxels_per_side(), block_B.voxels_per_side());
64 
65  EXPECT_NEAR(block_A.origin().x(), block_B.origin().x(), kTolerance);
66  EXPECT_NEAR(block_A.origin().y(), block_B.origin().y(), kTolerance);
67  EXPECT_NEAR(block_A.origin().z(), block_B.origin().z(), kTolerance);
68 
69  EXPECT_EQ(block_A.num_voxels(), block_B.num_voxels());
70  for (size_t voxel_idx = 0u; voxel_idx < block_A.num_voxels(); ++voxel_idx) {
71  CompareVoxel(block_A.getVoxelByLinearIndex(voxel_idx),
72  block_B.getVoxelByLinearIndex(voxel_idx));
73  }
74  }
75 
76  void CompareVoxel(const VoxelType& voxel_A, const VoxelType& voxel_B) const;
77 
78  static constexpr double kTolerance = 1e-10;
79 };
80 
81 template <typename VoxelType>
82 void LayerTest<VoxelType>::CompareVoxel(const VoxelType& /* voxel_A */,
83  const VoxelType& /* voxel_B */) const {
84  LOG(FATAL) << "Not implemented for this voxel type!";
85 }
86 
87 template <>
88 void LayerTest<EsdfVoxel>::CompareVoxel(const EsdfVoxel& voxel_A,
89  const EsdfVoxel& voxel_B) const {
90  constexpr double kTolerance = 1e-10;
91 
92  EXPECT_NEAR(voxel_A.distance, voxel_B.distance, kTolerance);
93 
94  // Flags
95  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.observed, voxel_B.observed);
96  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.hallucinated, voxel_B.hallucinated);
97  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.in_queue, voxel_B.in_queue);
98  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.fixed, voxel_B.fixed);
99 
100  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.parent.x(), voxel_B.parent.x());
101  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.parent.y(), voxel_B.parent.y());
102  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.parent.z(), voxel_B.parent.z());
103 }
104 
105 template <>
106 void LayerTest<OccupancyVoxel>::CompareVoxel(
107  const OccupancyVoxel& voxel_A, const OccupancyVoxel& voxel_B) const {
108  constexpr double kTolerance = 1e-10;
109 
110  EXPECT_NEAR(voxel_A.probability_log, voxel_B.probability_log, kTolerance);
111  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.observed, voxel_B.observed);
112 }
113 
114 template <>
115 void LayerTest<TsdfVoxel>::CompareVoxel(const TsdfVoxel& voxel_A,
116  const TsdfVoxel& voxel_B) const {
117  EXPECT_NEAR(voxel_A.distance, voxel_B.distance, kTolerance);
118  EXPECT_NEAR(voxel_A.weight, voxel_B.weight, kTolerance);
119  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.color.r, voxel_B.color.r);
120  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.color.g, voxel_B.color.g);
121  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.color.b, voxel_B.color.b);
122  EXPECT_EQ(voxel_A.color.a, voxel_B.color.a);
123 }
124 
125 template <>
126 void LayerTest<IntensityVoxel>::CompareVoxel(
127  const IntensityVoxel& voxel_A, const IntensityVoxel& voxel_B) const {
128  EXPECT_NEAR(voxel_A.intensity, voxel_B.intensity, kTolerance);
129  EXPECT_NEAR(voxel_A.weight, voxel_B.weight, kTolerance);
130 }
131 
132 template <typename VoxelType>
133 void fillVoxelWithTestData(size_t x, size_t y, size_t z, VoxelType* voxel);
134 
135 template <typename VoxelType>
136 void SetUpTestLayer(const IndexElement block_volume_diameter,
137  const IndexElement block_volume_offset,
138  Layer<VoxelType>* layer) {
139  CHECK_NOTNULL(layer);
140 
141  const IndexElement half_idx_range = block_volume_diameter / 2;
142 
143  // For better readability.
144  const IndexElement& min_idx = -half_idx_range + block_volume_offset;
145  const IndexElement& max_idx = half_idx_range + block_volume_offset;
146 
147  for (IndexElement x = min_idx; x <= max_idx; ++x) {
148  for (IndexElement y = min_idx; y <= max_idx; ++y) {
149  for (IndexElement z = min_idx; z <= max_idx; ++z) {
150  BlockIndex block_idx = {x, y, z};
151  typename Block<VoxelType>::Ptr block =
152  layer->allocateBlockPtrByIndex(block_idx);
153  VoxelType& voxel = block->getVoxelByLinearIndex(
154  (x * z + y) % layer->voxels_per_side());
155 
156  fillVoxelWithTestData(x, y, z, &voxel);
157 
158  block->has_data() = true;
159  }
160  }
161  }
162  const double size_in_MB = static_cast<double>(layer->getMemorySize()) * 1e-6;
163  std::cout << std::endl
164  << "Set up a test layer of size " << size_in_MB << " MB";
165 }
166 
167 template <typename VoxelType>
168 void SetUpTestLayer(const IndexElement block_volume_diameter,
169  Layer<VoxelType>* layer) {
170  constexpr IndexElement kBlockVolumeOffset = 0u;
171  SetUpTestLayer(block_volume_diameter, kBlockVolumeOffset, layer);
172 }
173 
174 template <>
175 inline void fillVoxelWithTestData(size_t x, size_t y, size_t z,
176  TsdfVoxel* voxel) {
177  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
178  voxel->distance = x * y * 0.66 + z;
179  voxel->weight = y * z * 0.33 + x;
180  voxel->color.r = static_cast<uint8_t>(x % 255);
181  voxel->color.g = static_cast<uint8_t>(y % 255);
182  voxel->color.b = static_cast<uint8_t>(z % 255);
183  voxel->color.a = static_cast<uint8_t>(x + y % 255);
184 }
185 
186 template <>
187 inline void fillVoxelWithTestData(size_t x, size_t y, size_t z,
188  EsdfVoxel* voxel) {
189  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
190  voxel->distance = x * y * 0.66 + z;
191  voxel->parent.x() = x % INT8_MAX;
192  voxel->parent.y() = y % INT8_MAX;
193  voxel->parent.z() = z % INT8_MAX;
194 
195  voxel->observed = true;
196  voxel->in_queue = true;
197  voxel->fixed = true;
198 }
199 
200 template <>
201 inline void fillVoxelWithTestData(size_t x, size_t y, size_t z,
202  OccupancyVoxel* voxel) {
203  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
204  voxel->probability_log = x * y * 0.66 + z;
205  voxel->observed = true;
206 }
207 
208 template <>
209 inline void fillVoxelWithTestData(size_t x, size_t y, size_t z,
210  IntensityVoxel* voxel) {
211  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
212  voxel->intensity = x * y * 0.66 + z;
213  voxel->weight = y * z * 0.33 + x;
214 }
